info.name: Vidhyadhan API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for all Vidhyadhan routes. Multi-branch: set baseUrl (e.g. http://localhost:3000 or http://localhost:8080), token (Bearer after login), schoolId and branchId. Create Student/Teacher/Staff/Class/Section/Subject require branchId. Student login response includes branchId and branchName.

request.description: Register a new school. Body: schoolName, adminName, mobileNumber (10 digits), email, password (min 8 chars, 1 letter, 1 number), confirmPassword

response.name: Success

request.description: Verify OTP and complete registration. Body: email, otp (6 digits), schoolName, adminName, mobileNumber, password, confirmPassword
School admin login. Body: schoolCode, email, password
Student login. Body: schoolCode, password, and either email OR admissionNumber. Response includes branchId and branchName.
Teacher login. Body: schoolCode, password, and either email OR employeeId
Reset password with token. Body: token, password, confirmPassword
Get current user profile. Requires: Authorization Bearer token
Get setup wizard state. Requires: protect
Step 1: Basic info. schoolType: School|College|Institute, academicYearStartMonth: January-December
Get complete school profile. Requires: protect, requireApprovedSchool
Update profile. Query: step (basic|contact|administrative|academic|timings|policies|optional). Body varies by step
Create class. Required: branchId (ObjectId). Branch-level admin can only use their branchId. Optional: subjects (array of subject names or IDs).
List students (branch-filtered for branch-level admin). Query: page, limit, search, classId, sectionId, status, academicYear, sortBy, sortOrder

Create student. Required: branchId (ObjectId), firstName, lastName, dateOfBirth, gender, classId, sectionId, admissionNumber. Gender: Male|Female|Other. Branch-level admin can only use their branchId.
List all teachers (branch-filtered for branch-level admin)
Create teacher. Required: branchId (ObjectId). Branch-level admin can only use their branchId.
List students (branch-filtered). Query: page, limit, search, classId, sectionId, status, academicYear
Create student. Required: branchId, firstName, lastName, classId, sectionId, admissionNumber, dateOfBirth, gender
Create section. Required: branchId, classId, name, code
Create subject. Required: branchId. type: Theory|Practical|Both
Payment gateway webhook - no auth. Body structure depends on gateway
Get marketing home - public, no auth
Create student via admin app. Required: branchId (ObjectId).
Create staff member. Required: branchId (ObjectId). Branch-level admin can only use their branchId.
List departments (school-wide + branch-specific for branch admin)
Create department. branchId: null = school-wide, or set ObjectId for branch-specific. Branch admin can only use their branchId or null.
List staff roles (school-wide + branch-specific for branch admin)
Create role. branchId: null = school-wide, or set ObjectId for branch-specific.
